purpose.summary: CICS online program that displays a paginated list of transactions from the TRANSACT VSAM file on map COTRN0A. Handles user selections to view transaction details via XCTL to COTRN01C, paging forward/backward with PF8/PF7, and returns to previous screens. Processes input from map COTRN0AI and populates output map COTRN0AO with transaction data.
purpose.business_context: CardDemo application for listing and selecting card transactions.

inputs.name: COTRN0AI
inputs.description: Input map fields for transaction list screen including selection fields SEL0001I-SEL0010I, transaction IDs TRNID01I-TRNID10I, input transaction ID TRNIDINI, and page number PAGENUMI

inputs.name: TRANSACT
inputs.description: VSAM dataset containing transaction records with key TRAN-ID

inputs.name: DFHCOMMAREA
inputs.description: Incoming commarea copied to CARDDEMO-COMMAREA for program context and navigation

outputs.name: COTRN0AO
outputs.description: Output map fields for transaction list screen including header info TITLE01O-TITLE02O, error message ERRMSGO, transaction display fields TRNID01O-TDATE10O etc., current date/time CURDATEO CURTIMEO

outputs.name: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Outgoing commarea passed to XCTL programs and RETURN TRANSID

called_programs.purpose: Return to main menu screen on PF3

business_rules.description: If user enters 'S' or 's' in any SEL000xI field with corresponding TRNIDxxI, XCTL to COTRN01C with selected transaction ID in commarea
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE on SEL fields to set CDEMO-CT00-TRN-SEL-FLG and CDEMO-CT00-TRN-SELECTED, then check for 'S'/'s' and XCTL
conditions: SEL0001I OF COTRN0AI NOT = SPACES AND LOW-VALUES

business_rules.description: Input transaction ID TRNIDINI must be numeric or spaces/LOW-VALUES; else error message and redisplay screen
business_rules.logic_summary: Check NUMERIC on TRNIDINI, set TRAN-ID, error if not
conditions: TRNIDINI OF COTRN0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES

business_rules.description: PF7 (backward) starts browse from first TRNID on screen or LOW-VALUES, reads 10 previous records
business_rules.logic_summary: Set TRAN-ID to CDEMO-CT00-TRNID-FIRST or LOW-VALUES, STARTBR, loop READPREV 10 times populating screen fields

business_rules.description: Display up to 10 transactions per page, track first/last TRNID and NEXT-PAGE-YES/NO for paging
business_rules.logic_summary: Loop WS-IDX 1-10, READNEXT/PREV, POPULATE-TRAN-DATA, set first/last and peek next for more pages

transforms.transformation_description: Extract YYYYMMDD from timestamp, format to MM/DD/YY
Direct move to display format PIC +99999999.99

copybooks_used.purpose: Defines CARDDEMO-COMMAREA including CDEMO-CT00-INFO for paging and selection context
Defines input/output map areas COTRN0AI and COTRN0AO for transaction list screen
Defines titles CCDA-TITLE01 CCDA-TITLE02 used in header
Defines date formatting fields WS-CURDATE-* WS-CURTIME-*
Defines TRAN-RECORD structure with TRAN-ID key, TRAN-AMT, TRAN-ORIG-TS, TRAN-DESC
Defines EIBAID attention key values like DFHENTER DFHPF7
Defines EIBCALEN and other CICS fields

paragraphs.purpose: Main control logic: initialize flags, handle first entry vs reentry, process AID keys, RETURN with TRANSID
Process selection fields and input TRNIDINI, handle 'S' selection XCTL, load first page
Handle backward paging from first TRNID
Handle forward paging from last TRNID
Browse forward: STARTBR, read up to 10 records, populate screen, check for more pages
Move current TRAN-RECORD fields to screen fields TRNIDxxI TDATExxI etc. based on WS-IDX, set first/last
Populate header, send map COTRN0A with/without ERASE

error_handling.action: Set WS-ERR-FLG 'Y', move error message to WS-MESSAGE, set TRNIDINL -1, PERFORM SEND-TRNLST-SCREEN
Set WS-ERR-FLG 'Y', error message, TRNIDINL -1, SEND-TRNLST-SCREEN
Set WS-ERR-FLG 'Y', invalid key message, SEND-TRNLST-SCREEN
Set TRANSACT-EOF, message about end/top of file, SEND-TRNLST-SCREEN

cics_operations.purpose: Send transaction list screen from COTRN0AO with CURSOR and optional ERASE
Start browse on TRAN-ID key for forward/backward paging
Read next transaction record into TRAN-RECORD
Read previous transaction record into TRAN-RECORD
Transfer control to transaction detail program
Return to CICS with next TRANSID CT00 and commarea

open_questions.question: Exact structure and lengths of fields in copybooks like CVTRA05Y TRAN-RECORD, COTRN00 map fields
open_questions.context: Copybooks not provided in source; inferred from usage but details UNKNOWN

open_questions.question: Called_by programs and full navigation flow
open_questions.context: No static analysis of callers; only outgoing XCTL/RETURN visible
open_questions.suggestion: Trace transaction flow from sign-on COSGN00C

open_questions.question: VSAM file organization of TRANSACT
open_questions.context: Assumed KSDS from STARTBR RIDFLD KEYLENGTH; no FD/SELECT
